column4: doh!  he's taken it off his site!  I'll upload my copy, just a sec.
need to add an installer to the script
do you have an easier way of pasting stuff to the pastebin when you can't run X?
not complaining about the script just all the geek help
um...  the script won't run if it's not executable
you can send the script a an executable
just make sure the script as an install stage built ine
I didn't send the script.  I uploaded it to a web site
well all the help scripts Ive done (self extracting installable files mostly)
his whole problem is that he can't get into X.  he can't click on anything.  do you understand?
he can boot ubuntu, and log in to a VC, but GNOME isn't working.
I don't see how a live cd will help.
well for starters give you a working Xorg.conf file
did you try to get him to start a basic X session without gnome
no, I was trying to get him to try GNOME as a different user.
we dont even know if the problem is gnome yet
